items.question: What is web maintenance and why is it important?
items.answer: Web maintenance ensures the security, performance and continuous update of a website. It helps avoid bugs, security flaws and slowness.

items.question: Why choose a web maintenance service in Marrakech?
items.answer: Our local agency understands the specific challenges of the Moroccan market and offers reactive local support.

items.question: What types of web maintenance are available?
items.answer: We offer preventive, corrective and evolutionary maintenance.

items.question: How often should web maintenance be performed?
items.answer: Basic maintenance should be performed monthly, but security monitoring must be active 24/7.

items.question: What are the risks of a site without maintenance?
items.answer: Hacking, data loss, site slowdown, and drastic drop in Google results.

items.question: Does web maintenance include data backup?
items.answer: Yes, we perform daily outsourced backups.

items.question: How much does a web maintenance service cost in Marrakech?
items.answer: Our packages are adapted to the size and complexity of your site. Contact us for a quote.

items.question: Can I manage my website maintenance myself?
items.answer: It is technically possible but risky without in-depth expertise.

items.question: How do I know if my site needs maintenance?
items.answer: If your site is slow, contains broken links or if you receive security alerts.

items.question: What types of sites require web maintenance?
items.answer: Absolutely all: showcase sites, e-commerce, blogs and application platforms.
